item.title: Project 1: Regularised Logistic Regression
item.description: In this project, I predicted whether microchips from a fabrication plant passes quality assur- ance (QA). During QA, each microchip goes through various tests to ensure it is functioning correctly. I had the test results for some microchips on two different tests. From these two tests, I wanted to determine whether the microchips should be accepted or rejected. To make the decision, I had a dataset of test results on past microchips, from which I built a logistic regression model.
